flawed_nl_solution:
The first square is 40 square feet because 8 x 5 = <<8*5=40>>40
The second square is 70 feet because 10 x 7= <<10*7=70>>70
The third square is 25 feet because 5 x 5 = <<5*5=25>>25
The total square footage is 315 feet because 40 + 70 + 25 = <<40+70+25=315>>315
The flag will be 21 feet tall because 315 / 15 = <<315/15=21>>21
#### 21

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 135, not 315. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
